name: Jahangir Hossain
text: Hello Good People. Welcome to this App. This is a Beta version of the original app. Here I used Github as Back-and server for this app. So whenever I update my json files on Github, only then this notice and files will be updated. Thank you. I'm still working on it. So Pray. Github Repository link: https://github.com/JHM69/CSE-11-JnU
